reviews.text: I stay here frequently for business ...clean, comfortable rooms & good service.
reviews.title: love this place

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We used our Hilton Honors points to stay at this hotel. It is an excellent hotel. Very clean, room was large and the bathroom was exceptionally large. We would definitely stay here again.
reviews.title: HIGHLY RECOMMEND

reviews.text: What a great new Hampton! I love the more contemporary look. We stayed on a stopover and were pleasantly suprised. The staff was friendly and professional. The room was fresh and clean and the breakfast was typical but satisfying. If we are ever in the area again, we will definitely stay!
reviews.title: If this is the future of the new Hampton Inn...count me in!

reviews.text: Hamptons I've stayed in; i'm a diamond VIP with HH. The service is excellent, rooms are always clean with ample room. This is my 5th stay at the hotel and will continue to do so. Only downside, its in a dry county.
reviews.title: One of the best...

reviews.text: Greeted by an excellent young lady woring the desk. The room was vey clean, quite comfortable. This was the third hotel in as many nights. It was the cheapest and the best.
reviews.title: excellent place

reviews.text: My family and I spent two nights at this hotel. The stay was excellent. We arrived at 9PM and checking was fast. We were located on the second floor. There were two elevators so there was never much of a wait there. As soon as we entered the room, I checked out the bathroom. It was very clean and pretty roomy. The counters were marble and included a coffee maker and hair dryer. The shower was clean with a multi stage shower head. The room had two double beds and each bed included four pillows each and very comfortable sheets with duvets. The room included a chair and also a desk with an office chair. There was a flat screen television with full local cable of at least 60 channels. There were plenty of storage if one would need storage in the drawers and also there was a refridgerator also in the room. It was not a full size but it was not a "mini" fridge either. Also a celing fan complimented the room as I never see celing fans in hotel rooms. I then checked out the rest of the hotel and it included an indoor swimming pool that starts at 3ft and goes to 5ft deep. There was no hot tub but we did enjoy the pool as we were the only family there. There is also a nice workout room as well as a buisness center with two computers for general use. I used the wireless in the room and it worked fine. Breakfast was complimentary and was fine. They had three types of cereals, several danishes/muffins/bagles. They also serve two hot items, Day one was belgin waffles and potatoes and the second day was cheese omlets and sausage. They did not have any sodas in the breakfast area but they did offer coffee, milk, water, apple, orange and cranberry juice. Checkout was easy and fast. Everyone that worked for the hotel was nice and greeted us.
reviews.title: Humbled by Hampton

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: New and well constructed hotel with very nice landscaping, lobby area, and pleasant staff. (I had made an error in my reservation but it was fixed with no problems.) Great room with comfortable beds, high speed Internet, amenities. Wish I could have stayed longer. Would absolutely recommend!
reviews.title: Great Hotel

reviews.text: Wonderful, new and very clean room.
reviews.title: Great Room - Great Service

reviews.text: The night manager was fantastic! He was so welcoming and very helpful.
reviews.title: Smellls new!

reviews.text: The only drawback is it is apparently a dry county - so if you want a drink with dinner you will have to swing down the road a mile or two.
reviews.title: Was nice and new, but they overcharged me

reviews.text: hotel is clean, rooms are comfortable, decorated beautifully. Breakfast is hot and plentiful. Although I have had better hot breakfasts at other Hamptons., this will still feed your stomach.
reviews.title: very nice

reviews.text: We've stayed here three times so far and I can't say enough good things about this hotel. Not only is it clean and well maintained, but the staff is incredibly nice and helpful. They make you want to come back. The rooms are large and have flat-screen tvs, fridge and microwave. Breakfast was good- typical Hampton fare. An extension of their welcoming attitude was the fact that even when breakfast was "over" the hostess made sure everyone got enough of what they wanted instead of putting it away because it was time. The exercise room was a nice size, clean and everything worked. We will definitely be back.
reviews.title: Can't Go Wrong

reviews.text: This is a beautiful, exceptionally clean hotel in a very nice safe little area just south of Little Rock. The employees are friendly and helpful. The indoor pool was a clean and warm. The breakfast was good. Would stay here again and again.
reviews.title: Like it so much, we stayed again on the way home

reviews.text: Check in was a breeze. The hotel is beautiful with crown molding everywhere. Beautiful lobby and breakfast area. Large rooms with all amentities. Great free breakfast. I would definitely stay here again!!!
reviews.title: Beautiful Hotel & Excellent Service

reviews.text: We were passing through and didn't want to stay in Memphis, so we chose this location just outside Memphis. It was absolutely beautiful! The rooms were spotless, roomy and the beds were so comfortable. I loved the duvets. The bathroom had granite countertops, was very clean with soft big towels. We stayed on a Wednesday, and they had fresh cookies waiting and a managers special that evening with a light meal. The complimentary breakfast had hot eggs, sausage, french toast, waffles, fresh fruit, cereals, and several bread assortments. There were also many restaurants nearby including Cracker Barrel. I would definitely stay there again and highly recommend it to others!
reviews.title: Fantastic Hotel!!

reviews.text: Everything was great, and a fabulous breakfast as well. Close to Little Rock. Nice area.
reviews.title: One of the best Hamptons we have stayed in.

reviews.text: Stayed at this Hampton Inn during a road trip to the NE. It is well located along I-30, well maintained, clean, quiet and comfortable. The rooms are very nice, especially for this price class of property, with all the amenities you might expect. The staff were all friendly, efficient and professional. I was walking past the front desk on my way out to dinner and the clerk looked up, smiled and asked "Is there anything I can do for you?" This is a first in all my years of staying in all classes of hotels.
reviews.title: Very good and a good value

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The complimentary breakfast, which includes eggs and sausage and fresh cooked waffles, is well above average. There are several decent restaurants in several price categories in the vicinity. I would certainly stay here again if I were in the area.
reviews.title: Wish we had more time in this hotel!

reviews.text: We stayed at this hotel on a drive from Dallas, TX home to DC. We arrived at the hotel very late and check-in was quick and easy. The hotel seemed very new and everything was in good working order.
reviews.title: Clean, comfortable and friendly

reviews.text: We used Hilton Honors points so we didn't pay anything for our one-night stay.
reviews.title: Top notch service. Cleanest hotel you'll find.

reviews.text: Like all the reviews before me, this place is fantastic. Probably one of the best Hampton's I've ever stayed in and a reason why I keep going back to them. Clean, convenient, friendly and delicious. They had a happy hour from 5-7 PM with free snacks, drinks, and pizza. We didn't even have to buy dinner that night. Warm cookies were waiting for us on check-in. The hotel is definitely a newer hotel and spotless. Bed were large and comfortable.
reviews.title: Great place for road warriors
